name: podamShouldGenerateANonNullPojoForAbstractTypesWithConcreteImplementation

testSteps.description: When I add a specific type for an abstract type or interface
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.AbstractTestPojo
Then the Pojo should not be null

title: Podam should generate a non null POJO for Abstract types with a concrete type
